summary: This document is an email chain from December 27, 2019, forwarding a PDF attachment titled 'ovs-claim-application.pdf' and discussing the need to fill out demographic information. The email suggests coordination on completing a victim compensation application, indicating ongoing administrative processes related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Email exchange regarding OVS application
events.description: Email correspondence discussing saving a PDF of an 'ovs-claim-application' and needing to complete demographic information, with an offer to walk through it together on Monday.

keyFacts: An email from December 27, 2019, references an 'ovs-claim-application.pdf', which likely pertains to a claim with a victim compensation program (possibly the New York State Office of Victim Services or similar).
The correspondence indicates administrative coordination to complete demographic sections of a victim compensation application.
The email chain is forwarded, suggesting multiple parties are involved in the process of submitting a claim related to the Epstein case.
